data.eml:eml: Metaxonchium persicum sp. n. from Iran (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Belondiridae), with an updated taxonomy of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peña-Santiago, R., Niknam, G., Álvarez-Ortega, S., Jabbari, H. (2014): Metaxonchium persicum sp. n. from Iran (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Belondiridae), with an updated taxonomy of the genus. Zootaxa 3785 (4): 501-517, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3785.4.1
